chunk_text:
Discover the best of each AVA with this tour option! Choose an AVA from below, or work with our team to build a tour around your favorite vineyard and we'll handle the rest: Eola/Amity, Dundee Hills, Van Duzer Corridor, 
##### Pricing
$595 for up to four guests, with an additional $100 per person for each extra guest. Optional Add-On: Elevate your experience with gourmet bites and sweets for just $25 per person.
